name: 'Indus' Sequin Leggings
description: These show-stopping sequin leggings have been a Rosa Bloom sell-out for the last 2 seasons - back by popular demand! The large round iridescent sequins create an incredible mermaid-skin effect. Quite simply stunning. Guaranteed to have people falling at your feet in awe, and stroking your legs in wonder! Every sequin is hand-stitched onto a base fabric of high-quality 95% cotton 5% lycra. Model also wears Feather Cape Please note...due to the nature of the construction, this is a delicate item of clothing and should be worn with care. Hand wash gently with no detergent!

name: 'Sea Circus' Sequin Playsuit
description: Last season's limited-edition pieces of this exclusive Rosa Bloom sequin playsuit sold out in record time! This sequin body is a true show-stopper. Possibly the most instantly-spectacular item of clothing you will ever own. Pull on this leotard and dress it up or down to your choosing, for a simply stunning outfit for festivals, parties, or performance. The large round sequins create an incredible mermaid scale effect, and the base fabric is a comfortable high-quality stretchy cotton lycra. The leotard is a flattering vintage swimsuit-style shape, with a low-cut leg, and low scooped back. Features include a small black frill around the leg, cute covered buttons down the front, and press studs in the crotch for added practicality. The model wears playsuit colour '9 Rainbow Black'. Model also wears Feather Cape Please note: every sequin is hand-sewn onto the playsuit, therefore due to the nature of the construction, this is a delicate item of clothing and should be worn with care. Hand wash only in cool water.

name: 'Sea Circus' Tonal Sequin Playsuit
description:
This limited-edition range of Sequin Playsuits features a tonal design of different coloured sequins, stitched into a graduated pattern to create a beautiful effect which accentuates and flatters the curvaceous form of the body.

This sequin body is a true show-stopper. Possibly the most instantly-spectacular item of clothing you will ever own. Pull on this leotard and dress it up or down to your choosing, for a simply stunning outfit for festivals, parties, or performance.

The large round sequins create an incredible mermaid scale effect, and the base fabric is a comfortable high-quality stretchy cotton lycra.

The leotard is a flattering vintage swimsuit-style shape, with a low-cut leg, and low scooped back.

Features include a small black frill around the leg, cute covered buttons down the front, and press studs in the crotch for added practicality.

Please note: every sequin is hand-sewn onto the playsuit, therefore due to the nature of the construction, this is a delicate item of clothing and should be worn with care. Hand wash only in cool water.

options.name: Turquoise to Sea Green Size XS (UK 8-10)
Turquoise to Sea Green Size S (UK 12)
Turquoise to Sea Green Size M (UK 14-16)
Turquoise to Sea Green Size L (UK 18-20 )

name: 'Tiger' Stripe Sequin Playsuit
description: Rosa Bloom's best-selling playsuit shape, this time embellished with oil-black sequins in a chevron pattern, designed to accentuate and flatter the curvaceous form of the body. The leotard is a flattering vintage swimsuit-style shape, with a low-cut leg, and low scooped back. Features include a small black frill around the leg, cute covered buttons down the front, and press studs in the crotch for added practicality. Model also wears a "Sequin Cape" Please note: every sequin is hand-sewn onto the playsuit, therefore due to the nature of the construction, this is a delicate item of clothing and should be worn with care.

name: 'Gigi' Sequin Hotpants
description: Large round iridescent sequins are hand-stitched onto these shorts like magical mermaid scales. The subtle iridescence of the colours changes at different angles and in different lights, creating a striking effect. The black cotton-lycra base is designed for a comfortable close fit, showing just the right amount of cheek! For the slightly shy amongst you sequin afficionados, these hotpants can be worn over leggings or tights, such as Rosa Bloom Lace Leggings. Warning: In bright sunlight or under disco lights, you may become a human mirror ball! This design is a Rosa Bloom Best-Seller Please select the colour and size you would like to buy from the drop-down menu. Model also wears 'Alanna' Shirt

name: 'Alanna' Shirt
description: PREVIOUSLY SOLD OUT, NOW BACK IN STOCK! This sublimely detailed shirt features intricate hand-stitched smocking, billowing out into dramatic bishop sleeves. The super smooth light voile fabric feels divine to wear, and is patterned with a subtle batik technique for an almost smoky look. This eye-catching shirt is guaranteed to be a talking point, and a new favourite feature piece in your wardrobe. Versatile enough to be dressed up with smart tailored trousers, or dressed down with denim shorts, or wear it out to play with our Sequin Hotpants! A collaboration between Rosa Bloom and designer Alanna Kaye. 100% Rayon Voile. Hand wash. This is a new design, and as such is only available in a short run of two sizes. More sizes shall become available should there be demand!

name: 'Kate' Sequin Cape
description: Large round iridescent sequins are hand-stitched onto a scallop-edged mini cape, to create a shimmery shoulder adornment that will add instant spectacle to your outfit. The ultimate in easy dressing-up, for minimum effort, and maximum effect! Secures with a tiny shell button. Model also wears 'Tiger' Stripe Sequin Playsuit

name: 'Guinevere' Feather Cape
description: Stunning feathered cape in rich jewel colours, with shell-inlaid buttons, and fully lined. This Feather Cape is an easy yet fantastical accessory - throw it on over the simplest of clothes and you instantly have a dramatic and striking outfit. Every colour tells a different story...black for old school glamour and mystique, hot pink for a playful pop of colour, white for a beautiful wedding cover-up... this is a surprisingly versatile and adaptable piece. Handmade inlaid shell star buttons add an intriguing detail, and allow the cape to be worn either fully buttoned-up with the buttons at the front or back, or partially open with the buttons at the front and just the top button done up. Model also wears Sequin Playsuit and Sequin Leggings Please note, due to the nature of the materials, this item is fragile and should be worn with care. The lining can be carefully washed with a damp sponge but do not submerge feathers in water Available colours shown in the drop-down menu below

name: 'Cirque' Frilly Knickers
description: Playful and delightful frilly shorts, in an array of deliciously rich colours, with quirky handmade buttons, and an explosion of ruffles on the bum. Made from sumptuous soft satin, a blend of 50% silk and 50% cotton, custom-dyed to create a range of beautifully co-ordinated colours. These are far too frilly and fabulous to be worn as underwear! They look great over tights or leggings, or peeking out from under a long top or short dress, or worn with a coordinating Rosa Bloom Bustle. Model also wears 'Queenie' Shirt and Feather Headdress (Festival exclusive). Available colours and sizes are listed in the drop-down menu.

name: 'Playa' Stripe Body Leotard
description: Graphic stripe paneled body, cut in a vintage swimsuit shape, with a flattering low scoop back. The striped sections are arranged to create a striking and figure-enhancing effect. This versatile one piece looks great worn under a cute pair of shorts, a colour-popping skirt, or layered over leggings, for comfortable, understated sexiness! Discreet press studs in the crotch add an element of practicality. Please note: This leotard is made from soft rayon jersey with 5% lycra, which is not suitable for use as swimwear - however, the same design is also available as a polyester lycra Swimming Costume.

name: 'Playa' Stripe Swimming Costume
description:
Bring back the one piece, with this graphic stripe paneled swimming costume! 

Cut in an easy-to-wear vintage swimsuit shape, with a flattering classic low scoop back.

The striped sections are arranged to create a striking and figure-enhancing effect.

This swimming costume is the same design as the Stripe Panel Leotard, but made from a polyester lycra fabric suited to swimwear, fully-lined, and without the press studs in the crotch!

<i> This swimsuit was made with the last remaining stock of a discontinued fabric, so is strictly limited edition!

name: 'Luna' Stripe Leggings
description:
Graphic stripe leggings cut in flattering panels for an optical illusion on your legs!

The striped sections are arranged to create a striking and figure-enhancing effect.

Made from soft smooth rayon-lycra jersey.

Finished with three covered buttons at the leg which can be worn open or closed.

name: 'Harlequin' Ruffs
description: Roll Up, Roll Up! Get ruffed-up with this brand new design from Rosa Bloom! Delicious layers of delicate tulle flounce one upon the other, embellished with metallic embroidery and tiny sequins. Can be tied around the neck, or get creative and clip it into your hair to make a playful fascinator, or on your bum to make a fabulous mini bustle! Perfect over our Frilly Knickers, or Sequin Playsuits. Or how about a tutu for a small child? Or two tied together to make a tutu for a bigger child / grown-up?! We're sure that there are many more possibilities that we haven't even dreamt up yet... ALSO available as a pair of Mini Ruffs - for tying around the wrists or ankles. Wristiruffs! Anklefluffs! You can even tie the Mini Ruff pair together to make a mini neck Ruff. As you can probably tell, we had a lot of fun designing these (and coming up with silly names) and I reckon we're going to have even more fun wearing them... I'd bet it's actually impossible not to have fun whilst wearing a Ruff. Or, indeed, a full set of Ruffs - neck, ankles, and wrists, as our model so beautifully illustrates. The third photo shows the Red/Hot Pink Large Ruff worn as a bustle, and the fourth photo shows a pair of Mini Pink/Turquoise Ruffs tied together to create a smaller neck Ruff.

name: 'Onyx' Lace Body
description: This sexy lace leotard is cut in our best-selling playsuit shape, with the addition of long fitted sleeves. Contrasting patterned lace and small covered buttons down the front add quirky detail to this new Rosa Bloom design. We love this piece teamed up with the 'Jet' Lace Leggings to create a striking one-piece. Also perfect for layering under any of our Sequin Playsuits for a bit of extra warmth on the arms. Looks stylishly sexy with your best black bra and a colour popping skirt, or layered over a bright coloured vest and fitted shorts. Please note: when worn on its own, this leotard is short! The model is wearing this leotard over a pair of 'Jet' Lace Leggings. It is cut in the same shape as our other Playsuits but with the addition of long sleeves Lace is a delicate fabric, and this leotard should be worn with care - watch out for snagging on the zips or buttons of other clothing! Hand wash separately.

name: 'Jet' Lace Leggings
description: This new design uses contrasting patterned lace panels to create a unique and eye-catching legging. These leggings were designed due to popular request - lots of you were asking for ideas of what to wear under your Sequin Playsuits or Sequin Hotpants, so we dreamt up these black beauties! Versatile and with just the right amount of coverage. They also layer up perfectly with our new Lace Body, to create an amazing all-in-one, as seen on the model here. For the bolder of you out there, they can also be worn with just black underwear. Lace is a delicate fabric, and these leggings should be worn with care - watch out for snagging on the zips or buttons of other clothing. Hand wash, and handle them like a pair of tights to insure they stay looking at their best!

name: 'Dannii' Silk Dress
description:
This vintage-inspired dress is made from pure silk satin, which is the ultimate luxurious fabric to wear.  The silk satin has been custom-dyed to Rosa Bloom's specifications, to create a range of rich, vibrant, and carefully co-ordinated colours.

Buttons on the hips and drawstrings in the skirt can be adjusted to create different lengths and looks - making this dress an extremely versatile piece to have in your wardrobe - wear it long for a summer wedding, or ruche it up for cocktails!

The shaped waistline accentuates the silhouette, and the low-scooped back is beautifully flattering.

The bodice contains a small amount of stretch, for a figure-hugging and comfortable fit.  A hidden zip in the side seam means there is no need to undo the buttons when dressing.

Hidden pockets in the skirt are a quirky design extra in this unique and unusual dress.

Bodice: 95% Silk, 5% Lycra
Skirt: 100% Silk

Hand wash in cool water with a delicate detergent.

<i> Every colour shown in the pictures is the same design - just buttoned and gathered in different ways to show the variety of ways in which it can be worn!

options.name: Petrol Blue / Burnt Orange Size S (UK 8)
Petrol Blue / Burnt Orange Size M (UK 10-12)
Petrol Blue / Burnt Orange Size L  (UK 12-14)

name: 'Vietnam' Shirt
description: A deliciously textured heavy crepe is used to make this shirt, giving it a beautiful drape. Perfect as a summer cover-up, but also a versatile piece for layering, which can be easily dressed up for evening or down for daytime. Detailed stitching and bronze sequin embellishments add the finishing touches to this new Rosa Bloom design. Can be worn wrapped around and tied, or simply draped open. Inspired by the tribal wear of northern Vietnam. Model also wears 'Playa' Swimming Costume and 'Dannii' Silk Dress

name: 'Tribe' Pompom Jacket
description: The design of this unusual and beautifully detailed jacket was inspired by the traditional clothing of the Lu tribe of northern Vietnam. In a subtly textured rayon-linen blend fabric, this light jacket is embellished with handmade pompoms from Thailand, and embossed brass sequins from India. Can be worn with the collar draped or folded open, or it can be crossed over and tied. Limited Edition. Model also wears 'Ziggy' Tie-Dye Leggings Handwash separately This is a new design, and as such is only available in a short run of two sizes. More sizes shall become available should there be demand!

name: 'Ziggy' Tie-Dye Leggings
description:
Tie-dyed leggings with hand-cut ladder work design.

Full length.

95% Cotton 5% Lycra

name: 'Queenie' Shirt
description: Silk-blend crepe shirt cut in an unusual wide sleeve shape. Beautifully detailed with delicate pin tucks radiating from the neckline, and triple-stitched edging at the sleeves. Finished with handmade harlequin shell buttons, and shaped pockets. 50% Silk 50% Viscose One Size - fits UK 8-12 Model also wears Bloomers and Frilly Knickers This is a new design, and as such is only available in a short run of one size. More sizes shall become available should there be demand!

name: 'Amelia' Short Bloomers
description:
These vintage-inspired bloomers, in a range of beautiful cotton and rayon fabrics, are a staple of the Rosa Bloom wardrobe. They are the same design as the short silk bloomers.

These short bloomers end just above the knee, or can be gathered at the hem using the drawstring, and pulled up further to create super cute bloomer shorts!

Perfect dressed up with a corset for a traditional burlesque look, or dressed down with a cute cropped blouse for a more casual romantic vintage style.

They also look delightful peeking out from under a skirt or dress, or even just a comfortable treat to potter around the house in.

The leg is finished with an embroidered trim, based on an original Edwardian pattern.

Every fabric also has a co-ordinated set of handmade buttons which embellish the waist panel.

Pockets add a practical finishing touch.

Please note:  These Bloomers are designed to be quite fitted on the waist and hips, therefore the sizes come up a little small.  If in doubt, go a size up from your normal size.

<i> Available colours and sizes are shown in the drop-down menu below

Cool wash, cool iron

name: 'Amelia' Long Bloomers
description:
These vintage-inspired bloomers, in a range of beautiful fabrics, are a staple of the Rosa Bloom wardrobe. They are the same design as the long silk bloomers.

Perfect dressed up with a corset for a burlesque look, or a cute cropped blouse for a more casual vintage style. They also look delightful peeking out from under a skirt or dress. Or even just a beautiful treat to potter around the house in.

Fabrics 10, 11, and 12 are thicker weight fabrics, perfect for chillier weather with woolly tights or chunky socks, leather boots, and your favourite old school knitwear!

Fabrics:
1,2,3: Fine Rayon Voile, with a lovely drape and soft touch
4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9: 100% Cotton
10: Cotton Needlecord
11: Light Tweed Wool Blend
12: Heavy Cotton

They have a drawstring bow around the hem, so that they can be gathered close to the leg, or left to hang loose. The leg is finished with an embroidered trim, based on an original Edwardian pattern.

They even have pockets.

Each different fabric has a different set of beautiful handmade buttons embellishing the waistline.

Please note:  These Bloomers are designed to be quite fitted on the waist and hips, therefore the sizes come up a little small.  If in doubt, go a size up from your normal size.

<i> Available colours and sizes are listed in the drop-down menu below.

name: 'Amelia' Short Silk Bloomers
description: These vintage-inspired silk bloomers, in a range of rich colours, are a staple of the Rosa Bloom wardrobe. These short bloomers end just above the knee, or can be gathered at the hem using the drawstring, and pulled up further to create super cute bloomer shorts! Perfect dressed up with a corset for a traditional burlesque look, or dressed down with a cute cropped blouse for a more casual romantic vintage style. They also look delightful peeking out from under a skirt or dress, or even just a luxurious treat to potter around the house in. The leg is finished with an embroidered trim, based on an original Edwardian pattern. The last photo shows an example of the embroidery - the thread colour varies depending on the fabric. Made from a sumptuous blend of 50% silk and 50% cotton, a fabric which not only feels beautiful to wear, but also has a lovely satin sheen and drape. Please note: These Bloomers are designed to be quite fitted on the waist and hips, therefore the sizes come up a little small. If in doubt, go a size up from your normal size. Also, the Slate Grey is a little darker than it appears in the photo. Model also wears 'Queenie' Shirt and 'Flapper' Pendant Available colours and sizes are shown in the drop-down menu below Cool wash, cool iron

name: 'Amelia' Long Silk Bloomers
description: These vintage-inspired silk bloomers, in a range of rich colours, are a staple of the Rosa Bloom wardrobe. Perfect dressed up with a corset for a traditional burlesque look, or dressed down with a cute cropped blouse for a more casual romantic vintage style. They also look delightful peeking out from under a skirt or dress, or even just a luxurious treat to potter around the house in. These long bloomers have a drawstring bow around the hem, so that they can be gathered close to the leg, or left to hang loose. The leg is finished with an embroidered trim, based on an original Edwardian pattern. The last photo shows an example of the embroidery - the thread colour varies depending on the fabric. Made from a sumptuous blend of 50% silk and 50% cotton, a fabric which not only feels beautiful to wear, but also has a lovely satin sheen and drape. Please note: These Bloomers are designed to be quite fitted on the waist and hips, therefore the sizes come up a little small. If in doubt, go a size up from your normal size. Model also wears 'Queenie' Shirt and 'Flapper' Pendant Available colours and sizes are shown in the drop-down menu below Cool wash, cool iron

name: Bustle - 'Sapphire'
description:
This sumptuous Bustle has two layers of stunning 100% silk, ruched to create volume, and lined with starched tulle so it holds its shape.

The underlayers of yet more gathered tulle, with contrast-stitched edging, create a decadent effect.

This design ties at the front with a silk bow, making it truly a 'one size fits all' garment.

This versatile piece looks fabulous worn over frilly knickers, hotpants, bloomers, skirts, dresses, or leggings. Perfect for burlesque or circus costumes.

The silk used in this piece is hand-picked by Rosa Bloom in Thailand, where it is a traditionally crafted fabric; the finest silk threads dyed in beautiful hues are woven together to create a unique depth of colour, sheen, and iridescence.

A Rosa Bloom design. This colour is a limited edition of just 3 pieces.

This Bustle would like to be worn: with bare feet and silk ribbons in your hair

name: Bustle - 'Daydream in Blue'
description:
This sumptuous Bustle has two layers of stunning 100% silk, ruched to create volume, and lined with starched tulle so it holds its shape.

The underlayers of yet more gathered tulle, with contrast-stitched edging, create a decadent effect.

This design ties at the front with a silk bow, making it truly a 'one size fits all' garment.

This versatile piece looks fabulous worn over frilly knickers, hotpants, bloomers, skirts, dresses, or leggings. Perfect for burlesque or circus costumes.

The silk used in this piece is hand-picked by Rosa Bloom in Thailand, where it is a traditionally crafted fabric; the finest silk threads dyed in beautiful hues are woven together to create a unique depth of colour, sheen, and iridescence.

A Rosa Bloom design. This colour is a limited edition of just 2 pieces.

<i>This Bustle would like to be worn: whilst eating blueberries off your naked lover's body without using your hands

name: Flapper Pendant - 2nd Edition/No.04
description:
Hand-carved wings of shell are set in Sterling Silver, intricately engineered into a miniature movable sculpture, and hand-finished with a delicate pendulum.  

When the pendulum is gently pulled, the wings 'flap' up and down.

This highly unusual collection is designed in the UK and handmade in Bali, Indonesia, where Rosa Bloom works alongside skilled artisan carvers and silversmiths, to turn the designs into beautifully-crafted jewellery.  

Rosa finishes the pieces herself by hand, adding a different pendulum to each one, to tune the balance and determine how the piece hangs and moves.  Every single one has a slightly different character and way of moving, due to the perfect imperfections of these completely hand-made little creatures.

Individually numbered, with an embossed stamp, as part of the limited 2nd Edition of this design - this is No. 04.

Each wing measures 4cm in length.  This piece comes with a 16" silver-plated chain, wrapped in tissue paper in an embossed metal gift box.  We recommend a 16" chain, because if worn on a longer chain, the pendant is more likely to become tangled.

Please note - due to the nature of the materials, this piece is delicate. Avoid dropping or knocking it on hard surfaces, and handle the mechanism gently.  It is designed to be played with carefully, but will not withstand yanking!  Not suitable for children.

name: Flapper Pendant - 2nd Edition/No.06
description:
Hand-carved wings of shell are set in Sterling Silver, intricately engineered into a miniature movable sculpture, and hand-finished with a delicate pendulum.  Set at the centre is a finely carved face.

When the pendulum is gently pulled, the wings 'flap' up and down.

This highly unusual collection is designed in the UK and handmade in Bali, Indonesia, where Rosa Bloom works alongside skilled artisan carvers and silversmiths, to turn the designs into beautifully-crafted jewellery.

When the pendulum is gently pulled, the wings 'flap' up and down.

This highly unusual collection is designed in the UK and handmade in Bali, Indonesia, where Rosa Bloom works alongside skilled artisan carvers and silversmiths, to turn the designs into beautifully-crafted jewellery.  

Rosa finishes the pieces herself by hand, adding a different pendulum to each one, to tune the balance and determine how the piece hangs and moves.  Every single one has a slightly different character and way of moving, due to the perfect imperfections of these completely hand-made little creatures.

Individually numbered, with an embossed stamp, as part of a limited 2nd Edition of this design - this is No. 19.

Each wing measures 4cm in length.  This piece comes with a 16" silver-plated chain, wrapped in tissue paper in an embossed metal gift box.  We recommend a 16" chain, because if worn on a longer chain, the pendant is more likely to become tangled.

Please note - due to the nature of the materials, this piece is delicate. Avoid dropping or knocking it on hard surfaces, and handle the mechanism gently.  It is designed to be played with carefully, but will not withstand yanking!  Not suitable for children.

name: Beaded Cape - 'Emerald'
description:
Crossing the borderline between jewellery and clothing, this stunning piece is made up of hundreds of strands of EMERALD GREEN glass beads, which give it a beautiful drape and movement when worn.   Handmade by artisans in Java, and fairly traded.  

Looks at its best when worn over a simple plain-coloured dress, with straps rather than sleeves, or even better, strapless.  In hotter weather, also looks fabulous worn over a bikini top, or, for the brave, bare skin!

This time-consuming design is rare and hard to get hold of, hence the limited quantities I am able to stock each season.

NOTE:  Due to the nature of its construction, this piece is delicate, and should be worn with care.

description:

NOTE: Due to the nature of its construction, this piece is delicate, and should be worn with care.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Having trouble choosing?  Treat someone to a Rosa Bloom Gift Voucher, and they can choose exactly what tickles their fancy!

Also great for a last-minute present if you've left it too late to have something sent.

You will be emailed a personalised gift voucher with a unique code which you can print.

Select the value you would like to purchase from the drop-down menu, or email us if you would like to arrange a different amount - we can make a voucher for any amount you like.
